position: Founder & CEO Epicon Capital Club | Private Family Office Advisor | Board Member Hellenic Business Council at Dubai Chamber | Host of Dubai Family Office Investment Summit

experience.title: Founder & CEO
experience.description: The Epicon Capital Club is a closed community exclusively for Family Offices, Entrepreneurs, Executives and Industry Leaders in the Middle East by Invitation Only.With a focus on green energy, environmental preservation and global sustainability, we offer to members the best investment opportunities to grow their wealth, diversify their portfolios and contribute to a better future. Our Premium Business Networking Events and Family Office Investment Summits are designed for like-minded individuals who share the same passion in achieving and enjoying the best of life.Interact and socialize with your peers while establishing authentic relationships that evolve into successful partnerships and investments based on trust and transparency.

Our Premium Business Networking Events and Family Office Investment Summits are designed for like-minded individuals who share the same passion in achieving and enjoying the best of life.Interact and socialize with your peers while establishing authentic relationships that evolve into successful partnerships and investments based on trust and transparency.

experience.title: Member Board of Directors
experience.description: Sophia is an elected member at the Board of Directors and the Head of Education Chapter along with the Women in Business Chapter. The Hellenic Business Council operates under the Patronage of Dubai Chambers and provides a point of reference for Ministries, Embassies and other governmental authorities of the Hellenic Republic and the United Arab Emirates.The Council represents and promotes the Greek Business community in UAE and participates at numerous government events hosted by the Dubai Chamber in collaboration with the Hellenic/Greek Embassy of UAE.

experience.title: Investments Head
experience.description: Super Founder Global Network is the world's largest investor, founder and executive network. We work alongside multi-billion $ fund managers, multi-billion $ exited founders and global leaders from Visa, State Farm Ventures, GE Capital, PepsiCo, Nike, Red Bull, Microsoft, Lehman Brothers, Standard Chartered, VC, PE and many more.Providing guidance advice and support, sharing professional expertise and experiences with the most aspiring founders specializing in growth hacking and business development strategy.
